data.comment: The big names in today's match at Adams Park have now been confirmed.
The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Cardiff with the kick-off.
In the minute 20, Cardiff make their first substitution with Filip Benkovic replacing Sean Morrison.
Goal! Ryan Tafazolli heads Wycombe into a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Curtis Thompson (Wycombe) has received a yellow card from Leigh Doughty.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Wycombe kick-off.
Goal! David Wheeler extends Wycombe's lead to 2-0 in Wycombe with a header.
In the minute 64, Fred Onyedinma is on a sub for Daryl Horgan for Wycombe.
The away team replace Mark Harris with Josh Murphy.
Junior Hoilett is replacing Will Vaulks for the away team.
In the minute 78, Adebayo Akinfenwa is replacing Uche Ikpeazu for Wycombe at Adams Park.
Uche Ikpeazu (Wycombe) has received a first yellow card.
Joe Bennett for Cardiff has been booked by Leigh Doughty and receives a first yellow card.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Cardiff's Leandro Bacuna has been booked in Wycombe.
Junior Hoilett puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
